heading: HR00237
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ALLEGED UNAUTHORIZED PURCHASE BY THE CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY OF THE PHILIPPINES (CAAP) OF LIFE INSURANCE PLANS WORTH A TOTAL OF PHP 500 MILLION FOR TEN (10) OF ITS OFFICIALS DESPITE LACK OF BOARD APPROVAL AND PROPER SELECTION CRITERIA
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00237
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE ALLEGED UNAUTHORIZED PURCHASE BY THE CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY OF THE PHILIPPINES (CAAP) OF LIFE INSURANCE PLANS WORTH A TOTAL OF PHP 500 MILLION FOR TEN (10) OF ITS OFFICIALS DESPITE LACK OF BOARD APPROVAL AND PROPER SELECTION CRITERIA
